data.prayer: Father, help the 2,484 believers in Brokopondo to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Brokopondo, Suriname
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Brokopondo.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 2,484 believers in Brokopondo against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Brokopondo, Suriname. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Lord we ask you on behalf of the Jew, Dutch people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, please provide access to your Word for everyone, especially believers in Brokopondo, Suriname.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Brokopondo to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.section_summary:
the state of Brokopondo, Suriname has a population of 14,500.

We estimate Brokopondo has 2,484 people who might know Jesus, 4,274 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 7,742 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Brokopondo, Suriname that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
